0-2.impact: Low risk from UV rays for the average person.
0-2.advice: Wear sunglasses on bright days. SPF 15+ if needed.

3-5.impact: Moderate risk of harm from unprotected sun exposure.
3-5.advice: Stay in shade near midday. Use SPF 50+ and wear a hat.

6-7.impact: High risk of harm from unprotected sun exposure.
6-7.advice: Avoid midday sun. Use full protection: hat, sunglasses, SPF 50+.

8-10.impact: Very high risk. Skin and eyes can be damaged quickly.
8-10.advice: Limit time outside. Use full UV protection.

11+.impact: Extreme risk. Unprotected skin can burn in minutes.
11+.advice: Avoid the sun. Stay indoors or use complete protection.
